}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device actually only has 2 antennas.. one is just a plastic stub with nothing inside.
The antennas are connected directly to the board via U.FL connectors. The OEM appears to be Cameo.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
